DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether injection Botulinum toxin type A muscle upper limb effective treating spasticity patient stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Botulinum Toxin Type A Against Placebo Treat Spasticity Arm After Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: The study consist randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , single-dose main period follow open-label , non-controlled , repeated-dose extension period ( Open-Label Extension Period - OLEX ) .
DOC.criteria: Upper limb spasticity Time since stroke great 3 month Need 400 U Botulinum toxin type A Body weight 50kg Fixed contracture upper limb Generalized disorder muscle activity like Myasthenia gravis preclude use Botulinum toxin Type A Infection injection site
